{@Rgn:48005} houses a huge number of argon troops. We need to take out some of their primary operatorsâ€”iknephar prelates and kalash sentinels.

This is a straightforward strike mission. Get in there and "hammer 'em," as the amani say.

Your attack weakened their hold. Hopefully, the Shariar can take advantage of it.

We're stronger for your service, . Well done.
